commit.message:
Rollup merge of #96409 - marmeladema:fix-nll-introduce-named-lifetime-suggestion, r=jackh726

Recover suggestions to introduce named lifetime under NLL

Fixes #96157

r? ```@jackh726```

Built on top of #96385 so only the second commit is relevant

verification.payload:
tree 240bb252daaf10b53adf6ed99d088c931cf6c082
parent b3329f84f4aa52216f6334ce56608a78ace0a98f
parent 2c9421823815cd6ce91afef0b4c7580483863416
author Dylan DPC <99973273+Dylan-DPC@users.noreply.github.com> 1651169581 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1651169581 +0200

Rollup merge of #96409 - marmeladema:fix-nll-introduce-named-lifetime-suggestion, r=jackh726

Recover suggestions to introduce named lifetime under NLL

Fixes #96157

r? ```@jackh726```

Built on top of #96385 so only the second commit is relevant

files.patch:
@@ -6,6 +6,11 @@ LL | pub fn foo(x: &mut Vec<&u8>, y: &u8) { x.push(y); }
    |                        |        |
    |                        |        let's call the lifetime of this reference `'1`
    |                        let's call the lifetime of this reference `'2`
+   |
+help: consider introducing a named lifetime parameter
+   |
+LL | pub fn foo<'a>(x: &mut Vec<&'a u8>, y: &'a u8) { x.push(y); }
+   |           ++++              ++          ++
